text: My car tyre punctured this morning. Drove to this Honda service centre , which was the nearest along the way. The Boss assessed and worked on patching himself before his tyre man come to work. He told me he helped , so that I don't reach office too late. Best in Customer focused service that I have come across. Thumbs up !!!
Excellent customer service and quick servicing. Enjoy Yakun breakfast and work while waiting for my car to be ready

No frills and hassle place to service your Honda vehicles. Went there after I received an unresistable deal from Kah Motor flash deal. Do take note that because of the space constraint, they do not have a proper waiting area and probably no eateries within a 300m radius. Kudos that the wait time for me was within 60mins!

If 0 star was an option I will choose that. Poor service. Been with Honda over ten years.  Battery flat after service. Feedback was followed by a quick and formality call to apologise and to finish their job. Nothing was done. Long running brand great car but reputation tarnishes by their post sales service. Pity.
Great place to send car for servicing. Comfortable air con lounge for customers, beverages, biscuits and TV. They have a sound proof room for checking out their stereos.
